Tyrael: Strikers, stop firing. Be ready to stand ground. This raid has 
gone further, and it has become the first battle of a war. Gather up, 
and prepare to open fire on my mark.

Burrock turned his eyeless face towards the base, made a few steps 
backwards, and stood ready for the predacon break-out.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> SS (another mental note):  Megatron could be useful
> later, I think he'd make a very nice Galactic Governor
> if I could control him.  But for now he's worth about
> as much to me as slag.
> 
> --- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Tyrael: So, I gather that we are all here. Very well
> > then. PREDACONS! 
> > WE ARE THE FIRST TRIPREDACUS STRIKERS! BY ORDER OF
> > THE TRIPREDACUS 
> > HIGH COUNCIL, WE COME TO DISPOSE OF THE PREDACON
> > RENEGADE NAMED 
> > MEGATRON! I, MAJOR TYRAEL, DEMAND THE WILLING
> > SURRENDERING OF THE 
> > RENEGADE. IN THE OPPOSITE CASE, I SHALL CONSIDER THE
> > REFUSAL AS AN ACT 
> > OF WAR BETWEEN US. WHAT SAY YOU?
> > 
> > He stopped firing, but didn't hold his troops back.
> > He knew that the 
> > war would probably be the only venue, as Megatron
> > was not likely to 
> > accept the terms.
> > 
> > Burrock, on the other hand, passed the surprise of
> > surfacing in water 
> > and transformed. There would be some action now. He
> > fired some darts.
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "deltazero1" <DeltaZero1@h...>
> > wrote:
> > > "its pretty much the same old here too" talon said
> > pulling put a 
> > > large gun that was made out of his dragon head and
> > fired a blue beam 
> > > at the base
> > 
> > 
>
